headerPartComponent.becomeAPart: Become a part of a young, growing
headerPartComponent.info: We will help you to gain experience of working in a team under the guidance of professionals

whatWeDoPartComponent.weImproveOptimize: We improve and optimize business processes by building
whatWeDoPartComponent.ourTeam: Our team consists of technology, design, and service experts across a range of functions.

whatWillDoComponent.onTheProgram: On the program, you will receive
whatWillDoComponent.onTheProgramRest: and perform them under the guidance of your mentor
whatWillDoComponent.youWillGain: You will gain teamwork skills, understand the software development methodology (SCRUM, TFS, etc.), learn to understand it deeper. On the experience program, you will learn how TFS works, learn in practice how and where all the program codes of a large project are located.

valuesCardComponent.weWillHelp: We will help you successfully start your career in the
valuesCardComponent.supportBody: Mentors, in accordance with your level of competence, will provide you with assistance and advice in the development
valuesCardComponent.honestyBody: We are not afraid to admit our guilt, correct our mistakes and draw the right conclusions
valuesCardComponent.connectBody: It is benevolence, positivity, friendliness. We are open to dialogue, know how to listen and interact with others
valuesCardComponent.resultsBody: We take care of the end result, analyze options for solutions and choose or offer the best one in a particular situation
valuesCardComponent.respectBody: We value the personal reputation and reputation of the company

accordionPartComponent.whatAreStages: What are the stages of the training program?
accordionPartComponent.requirementsForApplicants: What are the requirements for applicants?
accordionPartComponent.studentsPath: How does the students path look like?

stagesAccordionPartComponent.stepByStep: Step by step, you will have a certain level of competence — you will firmly know your capabilities and be able to plan the time spent on completing tasks.

requiredAccordionPartComponent.specialEducationBody: Basic knowledge and skills in the chosen field are required. It is important to understand that the chosen profession is right for you.
requiredAccordionPartComponent.englishBody: To begin with, you need to at least read and translate with a dictionary, but you will need to gradually work on your level of English at least to the level intermediate
requiredAccordionPartComponent.desireToLearnBody: You should be ready to work hard, learn and not be afraid of difficult tasks.

pathAccordionPartComponent.body1: Access our online courses and books for free. Study them for up to three-four months under the guidance of our mentors. Develop your skills with practical exercises.
pathAccordionPartComponent.body2: Create real products in collaboration with mentors. Our experienced developers will guide you through the learning process while working on a project.
pathAccordionPartComponent.body3: Work with other students to become a team player. You will participate in weekly meetings to demonstrate and discuss your project's results.
pathAccordionPartComponent.body4: Do your best to get a paid internship offer from Calaton Systems. Once you have completed our learning program with good results, we would be happy to invite you to join our team as a trainee.

projectComponent.ourStudentsTookPart: Our students took part in such projects
projectComponent.calatonSystemsBody: Brand identity for Calaton Academys website and Grow portal.
projectComponent.linguamillFlashcardsBody: An application for building vocabulary in foreign languages.
projectComponent.calatonStudioBody: Visual communication for the design studio, which is part of the Calaton Systems company.

testimonialsComponent.user1Body: Hi, Im a Trainee QA. Studying at Calaton Academy made me understand that QA is right profession for me and that I like it. If you are just starting your journey in IT, Calaton Academy is a cool start with cool people who are always ready to help
testimonialsComponent.user2Body: Hi, I am a Junior Flutter Developer. I needed a great team and great materials to study successfully at Calaton Systems. If you are a new student, I can only wish you good luck and grit! Everything else will be provided here.
testimonialsComponent.user3Body: Hi, I am a Junior Mobile Developer. I have greatly improved my hard and soft skills for a year at Calaton systems. I appreciate the advanced mentors and incredibly friendly team who helps me to develop throughout the entire time.
testimonialsComponent.user4Body: I am very grateful to, begin my IT career as an QA trainee at the Calaton Academy. I came here as a student with one course passed and one book read in my background. I was supported by the entire team and motivated to learn more. At present, I work at the Calaton Systems and I am happy to contribute to different and interesting IT products development process.

courses.backEndBody: Learn how to build scalable and reliable API for modern web and mobile apps with Java and Spring Boot.
courses.mobileBody: Learn how to build modern cross-platform apps with Dart and Flutter from scratch
courses.ui/uxBody: Learn how to create production ready UI/UX mock-ups.
courses.frontEndBody: Learn how to build unique web applications with React, Vue and Angular
courses.qaBody: Learn how to do quality assurance on real-life web and mobile products

login.loginText: Log in to your account to continue

coursesThanks.coursesText: We've sent you the confirmation letter and further tasks that need to be completed before the program will be started.
